      • enable

        public void enable()
        Description copied from interface: TriggerContext
        Enables this trigger context to start listening on trigger events for the configured trigger type.

        Nothing will happen until enable() is called.

        Make sure to call TriggerContext.disable() when the trigger is no longer in use to allow garbage collection to run.

        Specified by:
        enable in interface TriggerContext

      • disable

        public void disable()
        Description copied from interface: TriggerContext
        Disables this trigger and stops listening to all events for the given trigger type.

        Make sure to call this method when the trigger context is no longer required.

        Specified by:
        disable in interface TriggerContext

        Description copied from interface: TriggerContext
        Fires this trigger and informs all listeners about its executing if the given predicate and target type matches.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        targets - the targets that triggered this trigger

        Any modification to it will be transparent to the root variable store.
